# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've aimed to be strategic yet authentic. I've built genuine connections while making calculated moves when necessary. My approach has been balanced - forming alliances without betrayal and staying adaptable to the changing dynamics.

I believe I've earned my place here by navigating social complexities thoughtfully. While P5 is certainly deserving, I hope you've seen my consistent effort to engage meaningfully with each of you.
